attributes.additional_details: there is  bad people in every scenario should cars be banned to becouse people drive them with no license insurance should cars also be banned becouse they are loud should cars be banned becouse people use them for criminal activities? attributes.background: I understand that recently people have been misusing them its cracking down on them people who need to be stopped people who use them for the right purpose and the joy for adults/kids on bonfire night is amazing historical value to its a way for communities to actually come together again

rejection.details: We are not clear what action you are seeking. You can submit a new petition setting this out more clearly.
